This repository is the workflow of the Second chapter of Jose Henrique Bernardino Nascimento.
The Second Chapter has the objective of locating QTL in cassava genome related to resistance/tolerance to Foliar diseases of Cassava.

This workflow is separate in the following sections:

1. [Prepare Phenotypic Data](PhenData.html)
2. [Prepare Genotypic Data](GenData.html)
3. [GWAS Analysis](GWAS.html)
